title: 5 Game ban cause of Riot.
body:
So, i started a duo queue with my friend and joined a game, Once we are in, i called jg and all those other stuff. But when the countdown reached 0, the game didn't start, instead, it just froze. the same happened to my friend, in chat, i saw the other people leaving so i tried as well. Once i logged on, it just said reconnect and when i click it, nothing happens. the same happened with my friend. So yeah. If i get a 5 day ban .Thanks Riot <3


O yeah, and i tired using lolnexus to check if I'm in the game but it just says "The summoner littledue is not currently in a game."
Same goes with my friend.

Time: 1:40 pm (Auckland time)
          21/01/2016

replies.body: I told my other friend to check his friends list and it says im online.
